name: Darakhul High Priestess
description: The Darakhul High Priestess is a cunning undead creature with a sinister aura, marked by her half-plate armor and a gaunt appearance that speaks of her connection to death.
memorable: Her ability to disguise herself, paired with her stench and powerful spellcasting, makes her a unique and terrifying opponent.
goals: To manipulate and control the living and raise the dead to serve her purposes.
relations: May command minions such as ghouls or work alongside other undead creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, shadowy places, such as crypts or graveyards.
strengths: High resilience with poison immunity and powerful spellcasting capabilities.
weaknesses: Disadvantage on attack rolls and perception checks in sunlight, making her vulnerable during the day.
attacks: Engages with a multiattack that includes slashing claw attacks and a necrotic bite attack that can inflict diseases.
most_powerful_ability: Her spellcasting as a 15th-level spellcaster allows her to summon undead and deal devastating area damage with spells like Spirit Guardians.
senses: Darkvision up to 60 feet allows her to see in darkness.
skills: Excels in insight and deception, making her adept at manipulation and guile.
additional_information: Can make up to three bonus bite attacks in a frenzy.
Has a debilitating stench that poisons nearby creatures.
Can turn fallen foes into undead servants through her Animate Dead spell.
Gains advantage against effects that turn undead with Turning Defiance.
Utilizes Master of Disguise to blend in with the living.
spellcasting: As a 15th-level spellcaster, she wields powerful spells including Inflict Wounds, Spirit Guardians, and Antimagic Field.
test_queries: undead spellcaster with a dangerous stench
sinister priestess that can raise the dead
creature that has a poison aura in combat
